page.title: 10LOCAL EMPLOYMENT:BLSBY/THURG
page.content: The only employer of any size in the block is the{Boots' Company}who employ an estimated 40 at their animal research station in and around the{ {Priory}house at{Thurgarton.}There, {drugs}are{tested}to ensure they are safe for human use. They use mice,rats rabbits,dogs and marmosets. In recent years they have built a large,functional,unaesthetic building like a plastic hanger.Clearly the operation has a long term future. Fisons (ex-Boots) test chemicals on a good-sized fruit farm:mainly apples. At the{Woodyard}in{Bleasby}a couple of men saw up trees for pallets and pit props as well as supplying quality trees to the furniture industry. There is a two-man building firm.The only other jobs are domestic helpers, gardeners,and servers in the two shops and the three public houses.
